public static class FileRingOutputStream.RotateBySize extends Object implements FileRingOutputStream.RotationPredicate
Return true when a file size is exceeded.

  • Constructor Details

    • RotateBySize

      public RotateBySize(long rotate)

    • RotateBySize

      public RotateBySize(long rotate, File currentFile) throws IOException
      Construct using a file length as the starting point. If currentFile is a directory, it is assumed that the input file is a FileRing and the FileRing.getCurrentFile(File, String, String) is used to pull the length.
      Parameters:
      rotate - At what size to rotate.
      currentFile - The current file to start the length at.
      Throws:
      IOException - On error.

    • RotateBySize

      public RotateBySize(long rotate, File dir, String prefix, String suffix) throws IOException
      Construct assuming the current file ring.
      Parameters:
      rotate - At what size to rotate.
      dir - The directory that holds the file ring.
      prefix - The prefix.
      suffix - The suffix.
      Throws:
      IOException - On errors.
